metadata.synopsis: Human male Smiley Gheef. Steeps calculation: multiple buyers negotiate with a merchant on the price of their goods. The merchant is pretty much fleecing them, but they'll make a killing re-selling the explosive materials once the fight starts proper, and they know it.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to -212; 11; --187- Talk to the Human male buyer

0.speaker: Smiley Gheef
0.text: I was this close to landing that deal. Next time for sure!

1.speaker: Smiley Gheef
1.text: Hey, I've got the best interests of the city in mind. My main clients are the Flaming Fist, and I give them a discount.

2.speaker: Smiley Gheef
2.text: I've heard about you. Listen, I have a lot of friends in the Flaming Fists, so don't think I can be bullied around.
